name: js-school-project-raoapeksha
description: This is the static skeleton of the Timeline App.   It includes: - Header with logo and theme toggle button. - Navigation placeholder for filters. - Main section for timeline event markers. - Modal placeholder for future pop-ups. - Semantic HTML structure ready for styling and interactivity later stages. ## Stage 2:-CSS Structure This includes:- - Responsive layout using Flexbox - Styling for :   - event markers(years,dot and line)   - header and buttons   - modal placeholder - Responsive design using media queries to support various screen sizes.
